text: Lego is the largest tyre manufacturer in the world
Doug Engelbart invented the first computer mouse in around 1964 which was made of wood
After EastEnders, so many kettles are turned on that Britain has to borrow power from France
In the time it takes The Proclaimers to sing I'm Gonna Be (500 Miles), the International Space Station travels 500 miles, then 500 more
Oscar Wilde tore off and ate a corner of each page after he'd read it
The first director of Jaws was fired because he kept calling the shark a whale
